1.title: Meet the Star Dancers at Miami City Ballet School
1.plot: Get to know the six hopeful dancers who are students and apprentices at Miami City Ballet School. They come from as far away as Russia and Brazil, but all of them have dreams of joining the prestigious company as professional dancers.

2.title: One Student's Sacrifice for Her Ballet Dreams
2.plot: Welcome to Miami where the sand is hot and the competition is fierce. Meet Mayumi, a student at Miami City Ballet School and a company apprentice. For this 18-year-old, the stakes are high: She left her family and home in Brazil at age 14 to pursue her ultimate ballet dreams.

3.title: How a Professional Ballerina also Makes Time for School
3.plot: Ella Titus is not your typical high school student. With dreams of becoming a professional ballerina, Ella shows us a glimpse of her atypical world: she lives alone, attends regular high school for roughly an hour and a half a day, and spends most of her time dancing.

4.title: Watch This Dancer's Career-Making Audition Tape
4.plot: Valeriia Chaykina left Russia to train in America and adapt her classically trained technique to a modern, Western style of ballet. Now the pressure is on to find a job and stay in America as a professional dancer. Watch as she records her audition tape and receives a private invitation to audition for a major company.

5.title: With Everything on the Line, Fear of Injury Can Be Paralyzing
5.plot: Carlos Valdés and his family left everything behind in Cuba when they moved to America to support Carlos' pursuit of a professional ballet career. Then when Carlos got injured and could not dance for several months, his psychological fear of another injury became its own obstacle. See how he overcame that fear and grew stronger.

6.title: Finding Comfort Away from Home Through Performance
6.plot: Ballet dancer Gustavo Pachecco describes the challenges of living away from his family in Brazil as he pursues his ballet dreams in Miami. Even though his parents and siblings are far away, he carries their energy, love, and support as he dances.

7.title: Preparing for a High-Stakes Ballet Performance
7.plot: Miami City Ballet students prepare for a high-stakes performance that could determine whether they are offered a spot in the company. As pressure mounts, the students take a break to cool off (and practice lifts) at the beach.

8.title: Everything Culminates in the Final Performance
8.plot: After months of preparation, the dancers take the stage for their open barre ballet performance. This performance in part determines who is offered a contract with the company at Miami City Ballet. Find out who makes the cut.

9.title: Go Inside the Miami City Ballet Costume Shop
9.plot: Step inside the costume shop at Miami City Ballet, where costume designer and director Haydée Morales and her team create hundreds of intricate, handmade outfits for the dancers at MCB and MCBS.

10.title: How One Ballet School Is Changing the Landscape of Dance
10.plot: One of the missions at Miami City Ballet School is to offer promising students from countries around the world the chance to come to Miami to train with their elite company. See how their scholarships have completely transformed lives and inspired new generations of dancers to go after their dreams.

11.title: Mentorship and Role Models at Miami City Ballet
11.plot: See how the dancers in the company at Miami City Ballet mentor and serve as important role models to the younger students in the school.

12.title: How Ballet Skills Translate to Lifelong Success
12.plot: One of the most difficult periods of time in the life of a dancer (or any student) is transitioning from school to getting a full time job. See how different dancers find success and fulfillment after ballet school.

13.title: The Difference Between Classical and Modern Ballet Technique
13.plot: Dancer Valeriia Chaykina and her instructors at Miami City Ballet School demonstrate the differences between classical ballet technique and modern ballet more often seen in America and the West.

14.title: How Injury Makes You a Stronger Dancer
14.plot: When a dancer or athlete gets injured, it can feel like the world is falling apart. See how dancers at Miami City Ballet School bounce back from injury and become better performers for it.

15.title: Tips for How to Stand Out as a Ballet Dancer
15.plot: The dancers, instructors, and directors at Miami City Ballet School describe the innate artistic ability that makes one dancer stand out from the rest.

16.title: How to Audition for a Ballet Company
16.plot: The students at Miami City Ballet School prepare for audition season and talk about what it takes to make an audition tape that catches the attention of company artistic directors.

17.title: Watch the 'Strictly Ballet' Dancers React to Their 'Teen Vogue' Fashion Feature
17.plot: The Miami City Ballet School dancers, who star in the second season of Strictly Ballet, did a fashion shoot for Teen Vogue's June/ July issue. Watch them react to seeing their magazine feature for the first time.

18.title: How 'Teen Vogue' Helped This Ballet Student Come Back to America to Pursue His Dreams
18.plot: In order to get a visa to work in the United States as a professional dancer, Miami City Ballet School dancer Gustavo Pachecco had to travel back to Brazil to wait for the paperwork to go through. Unbeknownst to him and his family, Teen Vogue raised funds to help Gustavo come back to America to pursue his professional ballet dreams.

1.title: What It Takes to Be a Star
1.plot: Join us as we meet Jasmine, Mimi, Alec, and Victor, four teens who have made the major move to New York City to study at the world-renowned School of American Ballet.

2.title: Moving Away from Home
2.plot: Meet 15-year-old Stephanie and 14-year-old Emily, who have left their families to pursue big ballet dreams in New York City.

3.title: Dance Is for Athletes
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Facing the Competition
4.plot: No high school experience is complete without a little healthy rivalry. In this episode, Mimi shares how she handles the pressure to perform under the watchful gaze of New York City Ballet master Peter Martins.

5.title: Turning an Injury Into an Opportunity
5.plot: The students give us a glimpse into how challenging ballet can be on their bodies, including painful injuries that put them on the sidelines. Victor shares how hes developed an outlet in music to cope.

6.title: Preparing for Audition Season
6.plot: As the SAB school year comes to a close, its time for the seniors to start thinking about their professional futures. After dedicating their entire lives to dance, few things matter more than finding out which company, if any, they will dance for.

7.title: Dreaming of Getting Into the Company
7.plot: It's time for the seniors to show New York City Ballet what they've got. Can they prove they have what it takes for the next level?

8.title: The Dancers Reveal Their Favorite Movies and Shows (and, Yes, Celebrity Crushes)
8.plot: They may only have one day off every week, but these ballet students are still up on their pop culture!

9.title: The Truth About Dancing and Dating
9.plot: Having a love life in high school is never easy, but when you add classical ballet on top, there's a whole new layer. Mimi and Victor open up about what it's like balancing it all.

10.title: Prom Night
10.plot: When your prom consists of a bunch of classically trained ballerinas, It's not exactly a typical high school dance. Mimi shares her less-than-traditional experience from last year's special night with her friends.

11.title: Ever Wonder What Dancers Do When They're Not Dancing?
11.plot: They spend hours every day perfecting their craft in the studio-but what do they do for fun? You might have more in common than you think!

12.title: Taking a Class with New York City Ballet's Peter Martins
12.plot: Mimi and the other dancers get together and talk about how nerve-racking it can be when Peter Martins, the ballet master in chief of New York City Ballet (AKA the man who decides their fate), is looking in on class.

13.title: Watch Victor's Live Musical Performance
13.plot: Victor showcases his major talent outside the classroom as he performs in front of his classmates, and our cameras, at New York City's The Bitter End.

14.title: How to Follow Your Dreams
14.plot: These dancers have worked hard to get to where they are, and have gathered some serious wisdom along the way. Here, their best advice.

15.title: Strictly Ballet Bonus: Fun Facts About the Dancers
15.plot: We asked the SAB students to tell us something about themselves we wouldn't expect. See their surprising answers!

16.title: Strictly Ballet Bonus: What Would You Do If You Weren't a Dancer?
16.plot: Ballet is all-consuming for our students, but that doesn't mean they don't have other interests up their sleeves!

17.title: Finding Out What the Future Holds
17.plot: Audition season has come to an end and there's only one question on everyone's mind: Who did Peter Martins pick? In the season finale of Strictly Ballet, follow our six talented dancers as they prepare to take the next step in their careers.

18.title: Debunking the Myth That Dancers Don't Eat
18.plot: The biggest misconception about ballet dancers? That they skimp on food to stay slim. Hear what the SAB students have to say about what really goes down.

19.title: Life as a Professional Ballerina
19.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: Follow six students each season as they strive to soar as professional ballet dancers with top ballet companies. See whats it like to compete among the best at New York Citys School of American Ballet and at the Miami City Ballet School. (Short Form Series)
imdb.title: Strictly Ballet
plot: Join us as we meet Jasmine, Mimi, Alec, and Victor, four teens who have made the major move to New York City to study at the world-renowned School of American Ballet.

Follow six students each season as they strive to soar as professional ballet dancers with top ballet companies. See whats it like to compete among the best at New York Citys School of American Ballet and at the Miami City Ballet School. (Short Form Series)
